mapper.select:
SELECT i.`id`, i.collector_id as collectorId, i.item_type as itemType, i.`code`, i.`name`, i.`description`, i.data_type as dataType, i.data_unit as dataUnit, i.coefficient, i.max_value as `maxValue`, i.`state` FROM a_item i LEFT JOIN a_collector c on c.id = i.collector_id where 1 = 1
and c.building_id = #{buildingId}

select i.`id`, i.collector_id as collectorId, i.item_type as itemType, i.`code`, i.`name`, i.`description`, i.data_type as dataType, i.data_unit as dataUnit, i.coefficient, i.max_value as `maxValue`, i.`state` from a_item_group g LEFT JOIN a_item_group_mapper m on m.group_id = g.id LEFT JOIN a_item i on i.id = m.item_id where g.id = #{groupId} order by i.item_type asc, i.collector_id asc, i.name asc

select g.*, IFNULL(gg.itemNum,0) as itemNum from a_item_group g left join ( select count(id) as itemNum, group_id from a_item_group_mapper group by group_id ) gg on gg.group_id = g.id where g.building_id = #{buildingId}

SELECT i.`id`, i.collector_id as collectorId, i.item_type as itemType, i.`code`, i.`name`, i.`description`, i.data_type as dataType, i.data_unit as dataUnit, i.coefficient, i.max_value as `maxValue`, i.`state` FROM a_item i WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT i.`id`, i.collector_id as collectorId, i.item_type as itemType, i.`code`, i.`name`, i.`description`, i.data_type as dataType, i.data_unit as dataUnit, i.coefficient, i.max_value as `maxValue`, i.`state`, h.name as householdName, h.alias as householdAlias, d.other_data as otherData, d.indication as indication, d.updated_at as updateTime FROM a_item i left join a_household h on i.id = h.item_ids left join a_item_data d on i.id = d.item_id WHERE i.id = #{id}
SELECT g.id, g.code, g.type, g.name, g.parent, g.area, g.note, g.building_id as buildingId FROM a_item_group g where g.id = #{id}
SELECT g.id, g.code, g.type, g.name, g.parent, g.area, g.note, g.building_id as buildingId FROM a_item_group g where g.parent = #{id}

SELECT i.`id` as itemId, i.collector_id as collectorId, i.item_type as itemType, i.`code`, i.`name`, i.`description`, i.data_type as dataType, i.data_unit as dataUnit, i.coefficient, i.max_value as `maxValue`, i.`state`, r.id, r.rules FROM a_item i left join a_item_rule r on r.item_id = i.id where i.id = #{id}

insert.selectKey: select count(*) from a_item_rule where item_id = #{itemId}
